review: Amazon Fire TV Stick works great with my VISIO TV. Easier to navigate to Netflix, Hulu, Amazon Prime, and tons of other streaming apps and services.
author: Bill Hicks

review: It works as advertised very well.The only issue I had was it came preprogrammed in German. I had to guess at a few start up menus until I found the language settings.
author: mark robb

review: Easy to use, perfect for the kids tv
author: nikki rassler

review: My kids and I Love it.... Come in very handy for vacationing. We have some entertainment and gaming for those stay in days.
author: JMagadan76

review: We bought this for use on an older model flat screen without WiFi, this unit works great for us just what we wanted and expected....SCORE!
author: Richard W. Jones, Jr.

review: Too bad it doesn't have iTunes
author: Mark Wyman

review: I got tired of my husband and I trying to watch Netflix, Hulu and YouTube  huddled in front of the Laptop.  Now we can watch everything on the tv big screen. Since we do not go to the movies this was perfect for us. Best purchase I have made in a long time.
author: P. Capone
